import {React, useEffect} from "react"; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; export default function Sidebar() { const user = useSelector(state => state.User.user); const bankAccounts = useSelector(state => state.BankAccount.accounts); const debetCards = useSelector(state => state.Card.debet); const creditCards = useSelector(state => state.Card.credit); useEffect(() => { }, []) return (
